fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Smite a house at night.
- Divinely protect a person at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Houses that are smited will have their owners and any visitors attacked and cleaned that night.
- You will know the roles of the people you Smite.
- Divine protection grants a player Unstoppable Defence that night, you can Divine protect yourself.
